title: Gaining 120% ROI for PROLIGHTING | Case Study by Krish
content:
# Gaining 120% ROI for PROLIGHTING | Case Study by Krish

We helped a leading electronic B2C store from USA to achieve a whopping 120% ROI with enhanced eCommerce capabilities with Adobe Commerce. Read to know more.


Back To Work North America Solution B2C SERVICES Consulting & UX DesignDevelopment & IntegrationGrowth Support INDUSTRY Consumer Goods WEBSITE Pro Lighting 120% Increase In Revenue 48% Boost In Conversions 28% Rise In Visitors 12% Decrease in Average Checkout Time Spreading Bright Lights Across USA with Improved Commerce Offering Pro Digital Commerce to PROLIGHTING Headquartered in Detroit, MI, in the city of Brighton, PROLIGHTING has been operating for more than a decade to offer online lighting supplies. Being an industry leader with their online store, the brand is a widely acknowledged distributor of lighting products. They are a licensed dealer of leading brands like CREE, RAB Lighting, Lutron, GE, and JUNO Lighting, among others. While it was all going well until they noticed they needed a better platform to boost their business. Successful digital commerce is about delivering more than expected. Anonymous Challenges Finding The Dark Spots Lack of customer-centric shopping front Poor customer and inventory support at the backend Inefficient order fulfillment Performance issues in terms of page load speed and lower conversion rates Inability to handle footfall on peak days Lack of engaging UI and UX Solution Filling The Spots With Needed Blend Of Light Having a prevailing digital commerce presence and experience in this arena, PROLIGHTING has a clear agenda on what it was looking for. The experts at Krish soon carved out an upgrade strategy to fulfill the vision of the brand and fix the loopholes hampering the performance. The Strategy Key elements included design, interface, enhancing buying experience, lessening the load time, etc. While the first step was to re-platform from a SaaS eCommerce solution to a Magento Enterprise suite in order to enable an intelligent path to customers, the team also considered restructuring catalog and customer data with all essential segregations to improve navigation flow. This enabled targeted promotions for discount campaigns and volume discount slabs for bulk buyers. Technology Mobile First Design Delivering a mobile-first layout to cater to M-Commerce customers. Client Speaks Kyle Kluska President, PROLIGHTING Group Result Enchanting and expanding with Magento Enterprise Once went live, the brand did gain the attention of Magento and got nominated under the best commerce launch in the 2016 category. Talking about figures, it noticed a tremendous hike of 120% in its revenue, and a rise of 28% was noticed in site visits. Also, viewers started staying longer on the site, the number of pages per visit too increased, and the conversion rate touched a new record.
